name: Totally Legitimate Journalist Simulator
description:
Description: 
You start a new free lancer job as a journalist within a news agency, to keep your job you must create news articles which gets hits. However, do you keep your integrity? Or do you push to gain as many hits as possible through fake news!?!? 

How To Play: 
Click and drag the headlines, pictures and article content to the correct position. Attempt to match the 'tone' of the headlines, pictures and article content to each of the three feature options, to create a coherent article. You have to create 5 sperate articles to post. Once you have a full article, press post to see your clicks increase! (The more false articles you post, the more clicks)
